name: Zead (Alpha v1.0)
description:
High-speed zombie FPS focussing on movement and reactions.

  • Wave-based (survival mode)
  • Gritty, 'fighting for your life' gameplay style
  • Sprinting zombies
  • Slow motion + great kill physics
  • Unlockable weapons and upgrades coming soon

Please send any feedback to dan@deftgames.com or @DeftGames on Twitter.

Enjoy!
